mapper.sql: a.id, a.org_id AS "org.id", a.code, a.name, a.ename, a.sex, a.birthday, a.address, a.tel, a.id_code, a.education, a.qq, a.email, a.is_open, a.photo, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_at, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_at, a.del_flag, d.name AS "org.name"
inner JOIN sys_org d ON a.org_id = d.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_employee( id, org_id, code, name, ename, sex, birthday, address, tel, id_code, education, qq, email, is_open, photo, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{org.id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{eName}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{idCode}, #{education}, #{qq}, #{email}, #{isOpen}, #{photo}, #{createBy.id}, #{createAt}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateAt}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_employee SET org_id = #{org.id}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, ename = #{eName}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, address = #{address}, tel = #{tel}, id_code = #{idCode}, education = #{education}, qq = #{qq}, email = #{email}, is_open = #{isOpen}, photo = #{photo}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_at = #{updateAt} WHERE id = #{id}
